title: Task management with org-roam Vol. 1: Path to Roam
description: Sharing my approach to task management in org-roam, showing how to organize tasks and projects across notes while maintaining compatibility with org-mode's agenda features. While org-roam favors smaller files over larger ones, we can still implement a familiar structure of tasks, projects, and meta-projects. The article explains the basic setup, though there are some visual quirks in the agenda buffer that we'll address in a follow-up post.
